parameters.formDescription: Fill in a few quick details, and one of our advisors will be in touch shortly to discuss your options.

parameters.subject: ={{ $json['First Name'] }} with Solar ECO
parameters.message:
=Hi  {{ $json['First Name'] }}, 

Mindy here from Solar ECO – thanks for reaching out!

I just saw your form submission. One of our reps will be giving you a quick call shortly. If you’re unavailable at the moment, just let me know when works best for you — or if there’s anything I can help with in the meantime.

Looking forward to speaking soon!

Best regards,
Mindy
From Solar ECO
